New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 61* off 25 balls, and 91.95 points
Key Match Events: Sikandar Raza and Ryan Burl saved some face for Zimbabwe with a 34-run partnership
Suryakumar Yadav took a catch to dismiss Sikandar Raza
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of adjusting quickly to the conditions in the semi-final
Craig Ervine mentioned that Zimbabwe could have changed their pace a bit more to counter Suryakumar Yadav's innings
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised Suryakumar Yadav's performance and said that he's been remarkable for the team
Craig Ervine said that Zimbabwe mustn't forget the work they did to get into the Super 12s and will look to build on that
Miscellaneous Highlights: The semi-finals line-up has been decided, with New Zealand vs Pakistan and India vs England
Suryakumar Yadav is the Player of the Match with 91.95 points
